summary: An aristocrat's daughter falls in love with a visiting archaeologist, but he holds a secret that could drive them apart.
cast: Ranveer Singh|Sonakshi Sinha|Barun Chanda|Adil Hussain|Vikrant Massey|Dibyendu Bhattacharya|Arif Zakaria|Pratap Jaiswal|Shirin Guha|Divya Dutta|Palan Kundu|Anirban Basu|Amit Saha|Dhruv Mookerji|Newton|Govind Pandey|Kodamath Saha|Sushil Tyagi|Phalguni Chatterjee|Mithu|Mukesh Chaddha|Ashwani Chauhdhry|Surya Bahl|Gurvinder Singh
title: Lootera
